title: Online/Away Button Not Working
body: Whenever I click the little green button near the top left under my summoner icon it doesn't change to say I'm away. It only started this patch and started seeing it a few days ago. I've tried a client repair and it has happened since i first saw it every time. Help please.

replies.body: Apologies for the late reply. As far as I'm aware, there was a bug affecting the away-status feature; however, the issue should now be resolved. Please let me know if you're still encountering any issues!
